adjust CoreConn timeouts, 10s timeout on connect and 1min timeout on broken pipe

Changed 'settings' to 'preferences'

http://www.google.com/design/spec/patterns/settings.html#settings-settings
> The action for accessing Settings should always be simply labelled as “Settings”.

Merge pull request #225 from justjanne/pr/minor-translation

Changed 'settings' to 'preferences'

Merge pull request #222 from justjanne/pr/notification-link-to-buffer

Clicking on a notification now opens the correct buffer
Removed unnecessary Google stuff from .travis.yml

Fix styling of NOTICE messages

After the UI overhaul, NOTICE messages did not display the sender
and did not parse IRC formatting codes.  This patch fixes that.

Fix stuck 'Connecting' message

If Android tells us the network is unavailable while we are
connecting, it would previously cause the Connecting message to get
stuck indefinitely with no error.  It would be a better idea to
display an error in this case so the user doesn't get confused.

Fix removing networks while Quasseldroid is running

Previously, the network was removed from the map but not from the
list.  This caused networks to never disappear from the buffer list
after being deleted.
Hopefully working fix
